name: BREW BRACKET: A beer tasting tournament kit
blurb: Brew Bracket is a beer tasting party in a box. Get all you need to compare 8 beers in a head to head blind tournament with friends.

name: Transylvania: A game played in the dark
blurb: The hidden role party game of vampires and villagers played in a darkened room. For six or more people.

name: BUCKETBALL - Play! Throw! Splash!
blurb: BucketBall is a new beach, poolside and backyard game that is played like beer pong but on a larger scale with buckets & tennis balls.

name: The Age of Turing - An Interactive Experience
blurb: The Age of Turing is an online interactive game experience that explores the legacy of Alan Turing in hopes to inspire positive change.

name: Quest Scouts- Help Us Blast Off & Print Our Badge Books!
blurb: Complete objectives in categories ranging from art to research to travel. Collect real life badges as trophies for your achievements.

name: Assassins Ball: Rise of Sorengard
blurb: Enter a world filled with assassins at PAX Prime 2015. Pick a faction, find your target, and make new friends.

name: Enigma Escape | The Live Escape Game Experience in London
blurb: Take our real life escape challenge. You and your friends immersed in a video game environment. Solve puzzles and escape in 60 minutes!

name: The Small Viking Axe Game - a fun new board game.
blurb:
Bring out the Viking in You! 
Perfect game for your baberque party, camping trip, or in your backyard! This is Highly Addictive!

name: DAEMON - Augmented Reality Game
blurb: DAEMON is a Cyberpunk Augmented Reality game that ends with a New Media/Glitch Art gallery show.

name: SHIT HAPPENS. Might as well make a game out of it.
blurb: An offensive but true-to-life party game.  HORRIBLE LIFE EVENTS, all rated from 1 to 100. Can you put them in their correct order?

name: Sportspateria
blurb: A sport of paddles, squares and arcs. Easy to set up, easier to play. The greatest addition to any park or beach day #sportspateria

name: Ghost Court
blurb: A ridiculous party game about ghosts and the people who sue them!

name: Bring a Haunted Escape Room to Lincoln! Fall 2016
blurb: Escape Lincoln is opening a HAUNTED escape room this fall in Lincoln, NE. Pre-order your tickets and special swag! Quantities limited.

name: Mystery Night App - Murder Mystery Party Games Made Easy
blurb: Mystery Night App is an easy way to purchase and play freeform murder mystery games or host mystery dinner parties.

name: The Board Game Arcade
blurb: We've got a radical idea, man: 12 Hours of Board gaming, where you can win tickets and turn them in for prizes. Most Excellent.

name: Pittsburgh Escape Artists ~ the art is in the escape!
blurb: THE escape room game. Your team is challenged to discover clues, solve puzzles & manipulate contraptions TOGETHER to escape in time!

name: Combo & Key Escape Rooms
blurb:
Getting locked up in a room shouldn't be this much fun. 

Help me help you get yourself trapped in a room!

name: PHARISEES: The Party Game
blurb: It's The Pharisees vs. The Disciples in this new take on a classic party game. It's like Mafia... but with a lot more Bible verses.

name: FantastiCon 2016 - help us make it the biggest and best yet!
blurb: Celebrate Sci-Fi, Fantasy, Gaming, Virtual Reality, Cosplay, Music, & Elite: Dangerous! Be inspired! Join the adventure at FantastiCon!

name: CHIPPO: The New Golf Game for Beach, Backyard & Tailgate
blurb: Chippo is the glorious lovechild of golf and classic backyard games like cornhole (bean-bag toss) and washers. Grip it and chip it!

name: CoH2 Grand Championship Series
blurb: Nine weeks of intense CoH2 action featuring one epic 32 player tournament with every single game cast live for your viewing pleasure.

name: Get Your Whimsy In the Mail & Make Magic for Others, Too
blurb: Remember your magic. Be a Unicorn Scout. We host events, send magic mail, give out horns & want EVERYONE to let their unihorn shine.

name: Bothwell School of Witchcraft, UK
blurb: Be a witch in a world alive with magic at the Bothwell School of Witchcraft. Stay at our Castle and join this enchanting experience.

name: Crescendo Giocoso
blurb:
A live action role-playlist with twelve larp scenarios
from Oscar Biffi & The Italian Chamber Orchestra.

name: FantastiCon 2017: Fantasy & SciFi in the UK City of Culture!
blurb: FantastiCon: the annual action-packed interactive Hull weekend with VR/gaming/cosplay/NERF/live music and FREE SOFT DRINKS & BISCUITS!

name: Riesenspiel Köln 19.03.17
blurb: Alieninvasion auf der Erde und du als Regierungsmitglied musst reagieren!

name: Beer Pong Golf : Golf Spieth Can't Master
blurb: This Will Change How You Tailgate

name: The Wall 2061 Citygame
blurb: The Wall 2061 is a city-wide live-action roleplaying game (Larp) where you dive into a Berlin where The Wall still stands.

name: FantastiCon 2018 :- Join us for the UK's most diverse event!
blurb: FantastiCon brings together on & offline gaming, NERF wars, live music, VR, drone racing, 3D printing and more, all with free biscuits!

name: Escape Room Experience For Snohomish County & Beyond
blurb: We're building a fun, immersive, live action escape room experience to downtown Everett, WA. Can you escape in under an hour?

name: bask HEAD ball: Hilarious Foam Basketball Party Game
blurb: baskHEADball: new fun live game for all ages, played at the beach, BBQ, tailgate, or inside- as a drinking game or family friendly fun.

name: THE HOSER! - Made by Kids for Kids Fun in the Sun!
blurb: IT'S READY!  The Hoser is made by KIDS FOR KIDS and is a perfected attachment for kids water sport & sprinkler fun!

name: FantastiCon 2019
blurb: The UK's most diverse, activity packed convention by the sea!

name: Foocket - Aussie innovation combining Football and cricket.
blurb: The fun new concept bringing people together to encourage an active life full of fun, skills, fitness, teamwork and development.

name: Flight Club: Performance Artwork and Live Street Game
blurb:
Hit opponent with plane for high-score!
Multiple paper planes, 2-4 players.
Throw, hit/catch, repeat!

name: Otherworlds Adventures | RPG Livestream | Break Kickstarter
blurb: A Roleplaying (RPG) Game series in a new setting - Anthos. A world with dark beast known as chimera, that are attacking civilization.

name: Hunters of Avalon
blurb: "It's D&D, IRL." Experience an adventure like none other in this immersive mix of tabletop gaming, escape rooms, and summer camp.

name: High Die: Official Game Box
blurb: Toke a Chance with High Die, the #1 Interactive Smoking Game!

name: Bring on the Wine: Taste wines and compete with your friends
blurb: Stop Guessing Wines and Start Rating Them.

name: Woogles
blurb: We’re the home for competitive, real-time word gaming.

name: Boardball: The new way to bump-set-spike!
blurb: A quick & easy set up, so you can spend less time searching for courts and more time playing.

name: Make A Scene Larp Anthologies
blurb: Two books of original larps written for Minnesota's live-action scenario festival

name: Beer Darts: A Designer Drinking Game
blurb: An outrageously re-imagined live game-set for your next adventure, block party, beach day, tailgate and more!

name: Cover 10 Cornhole
blurb: A Unique Spin on two Summertime Classics: Beer Pong meets Cornhole

name: Flip Fit - The Fun Family Fitness Game
blurb: A family fitness game promoting parents to engage with their children through humor, imagination and exercise.

name: Fair Game's 2022 International Women's Day Conference
blurb: Attend our first flagship event - a virtual conference focusing on gender equality, the future of the game and tackling prejudice.

name: Death in the Alps - An Immersive Virtual Murder Mystery
blurb: We are heading off to Les Trois Vallées in France for a Mystery weekend of first-class slopes and suspicious suspects.

name: Clocktower Con - Annual Gaming Convention
blurb: An annual convention bringing together the Blood on the Clocktower gaming community to play and enjoy social deception gaming.

name: Deck of Many Things - The Colours of Magic!
blurb: A legendary item, compatible with all D&D and Pathfinder games! Twenty-two fully illustrated cards in a deluxe box or velvet pouch.

name: Candy Cane Wormhole Game!
blurb: A Christmas Treasure Hunt Tradition for ages 3+.

name: The Mutanti Cycle - Whispers of War, a spy craft D&D game
blurb: Trigger the events that will lead to war in this, the first part of three campaigns, where PCs must be spies and noone can be trusted
